
# locales


## Config File Path

| Config File Path |
| --- |
| [/etc/default/locale](./asset/overlay/etc/default/locale) |
| [/etc/locale.conf](./asset/overlay/etc/locale.conf) |


## Debian Package

| Debian Package |
| --- |
| [locales](https://packages.debian.org/sid/locales) |


## Howto


### install

``` sh
$ ./install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make install
```


### package-install

``` sh
$ ./package-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make package-install
```


### config-install

``` sh
$ ./config-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make config-install
```
